meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Doug Dodson Carl Conway Andrew Knudsen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7831.

td.p: Doug Dodson, a classical singer from Boston, Massachusetts
Carl Conway, a chef educator from Indianapolis, Indiana
Andrew Knudsen, an environmental lawyer from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,601)

tr.td: GETTING SPECIFIC AT GENERAL HOSPITAL
PRESIDENTS' MIDDLE NAMES
POP CULTURE POPS
COMPLETE THE NANCY DREW BOOK TITLE
ON THE FAST FOOD MENU
NEWSY PUNS

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Nancy Lee Grahn and Michelle Stafford give the clue as Alexis and Nina from General Hospital.) "You think you\'re getting away with it, Nina, but I\'m on to you"
"Oh, really Alexis? Well your little world, your sterile field, is about to be in this condition, compromised by the introduction of foreign bacteria"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
(Nancy Lee Grahn and Michelle Stafford give the clue as Alexis and Nina from General Hospital.) "You think you're getting away with it, Nina, but I'm on to you"
"Oh, really Alexis? Well your little world, your sterile field, is about to be in this condition, compromised by the introduction of foreign bacteria"
